option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/questionText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" android:textAlignment="center" android:text="@string/question_placeholder" />
<androidx.fragment.app.FragmentContainerView android:id="@+id/answers_fragment_container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" />
<Button android:id="@+id/resetButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/reset_button" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/questionText" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" android:textAlignment="center" android:text="@string/question_placeholder" />
<androidx.fragment.app.FragmentContainerView android:id="@+id/answers_fragment_container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" />
<Button android:id="@+id/resetButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/reset_button" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<resources> <string name="app_name">MiniQuiz</string>
<string name="answer_0">Odpowiedź 0</string> <string name="answer_1">Odpowiedź 1</string> <string name="answer_2">Odpowiedź 2</string>
<string name="result_label">Wynik: </string> <string name="reset_button">RESETUJ QUIZ</string>
<string name="question_placeholder">Pytanie</string> <string name="start_button">Rozpocznij quiz</string> <string name="author_text">Mini Quiz – Autor Bartosz Król</string>
<string name="result_format">Wynik %1$d/%2$d</string>
<string name="summary_text">Pobieramy jeszcze wynik quizu</string> <string name="summary_format">Koniec quizu! Twój wynik: %1$d/%2$d</string> </resources>
